title: Bookread
about: I am actually working on this application. You can register you account and then add a new book to read in future. Possibilities to planning a books, which are you going to read in countdown time.
usedSkills: React, React-Router, Redux, Styled-Components, SCSS, JavaScript

title: Phonebook
about: An application that uses authorization of the user who, after logging in, has access to his contacts. Ability to add new contacts, as well as delete unnecessary ones. Using react-router-dom for navigation and createAsyncThunk for authorization

title: Questify
about: Demo: password: Demo12345, login: demo@demo.pl An application used to create tasks and challenges with the ability to delete and edit created cards. After completing the task, the card can be moved to the done section. Overview of active and uncompleted tasks. Only for registered users. Team project finals of the GoIT course. I was the Team Leader on this project. Data fetching used by Redux Toolkit's 'RTK Query'
usedSkills: React, Redux, React-Router, JavaScript, Styled-Components, SCSS

title: Movies search
about: Simple React-Route application with the movie database using API: api.themoviedb.org. Shows the most popular videos of the day. Ability to search for any movie title

title: Image search - React
about: Photo search engine from the popular site pixabay.com. After click on picture, you can view them on large size. You can view more images by press 'Load more' button. Data fetching by axios, using search params

title: Event booster
about: Searching event in Your country. Used axios to data fetch from API. Using custom Pagination. Used font from Google Fonts. Mobile-first design responisve. Final group project of the JavaScript module, when I was the Team Leader.

title: Image search
about: Photo search engine from the popular site pixabay.com. After click on picture, you can view them on large size. You can view more images by press 'Load more' button. Data fetching by axios, using search params

title: Hellish English
about: An example of a Company website. Used BEM methodology for class name. Used the SASS preprocessor. Imported minified style sheet in the form of 'css/main.min.css'. The main style properties are created as Variables. Mobile-first design responsive.

title: Ice Cream
about: Final group project of the HTML/CSS module, when I was the Team Leader. The Ice Cream Company Website. Used BEM methodology for class name. Implemented process to include HTML partials inside of another HTML file. Used the SASS preprocessor. Imported minified style sheet in the form of 'css/main.min.css'. The main style properties are created as Variables. Mobile-first design responsive.

title: Web Studio
about: The Web Studio Company Website, created with Mobile-first design. All background and content raster images are responsive and support x1 and x2 pixel density. All classes named by BEM methodology. Imported minified style sheet, created by preprocessor SASS. The main style properties are created as Variables.

title: Barber shop
about: Barber shop Website. The main style properties are created as Variables. Used font from Google Fonts.
